help.add: {cyan-fg}/add ID{/cyan-fg} - Send a friend request to the specified steam ID.
help.autojoin: {cyan-fg}/autojoin CMD [arg]{/cyan-fg} - Interact with the autojoin array, allowing you to select which group chats to automatically join when you login.
help.autojoin add: {cyan-fg}/autojoin add [ID]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Add specified chat ID to autojoin array. No arg: Add current group chat to autojoin array.
help.autojoin del: {cyan-fg}/autojoin del [ID | index]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Remove specified chat ID or index number (counting from zero) from autojoin array. No arg: Remove current group chat from autojoin array.
help.autojoin run: {cyan-fg}/autojoin run{/cyan-fg} - Join the group chats in the autojoin array. Useful if you have just added a chat ID and don't want to restart.
help.block: {cyan-fg}/block ID{/cyan-fg} - Add a user to your ignore list.
help.connect: {cyan-fg}/connect{/cyan-fg} - Connect to Steam servers. Will reconnect if already connected.
help.debug: {cyan-fg}/debug LEVEL{/cyan-fg} - Set debug level. Debug levels: 0 = off, 1 = verbose, 2 = debug, 3 = silly.
help.dump: {cyan-fg}/dump{/cyan-fg} - Take a dump of the Steam object for debugging purposes.
help.games: {cyan-fg}/games{/cyan-fg} - Switch userlist window to display what games the users are playing.
help.get: {cyan-fg}/get [OPTION]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Print value of specified config option. No arg: Print all config options.
help.help: {cyan-fg}/help [CMD]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Print the help entry for the specified command. You may also use 'all' if you wish to display all help entries. No arg: Print introductory help message.
help.list: {yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg} - A list of entries is spawned in the userlist window. Use 'j' and 'k' or the arrow keys to scroll through the items and press 'Enter' to make a selection. Press 'q' if you wish to cancel the selection.
help.join: {cyan-fg}/join [chatID]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Join specified chat room. No arg: Join the chat room you were last invited to.
help.logfile: {cyan-fg}/logfile TRUE|FALSE [LEVEL]{/cyan-fg} - Enable or disable logging to file. You can specify a logging level with the second argument. Logging levels: 0 = error, 1 = warn, 2 = info (default), 3 = verbose, 4 = debug, 5 = silly.
help.part: {cyan-fg}/part{/cyan-fg} - Leave the chat or PM and close the window.
help.pm: {cyan-fg}/pm [username|ID]{/cyan-fg} - Arg: Start a conversation with the user with the following username (case insensitive and partial match) or Steam ID. No arg: Select a user in your friends list to message. {yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg}
help.quit: {cyan-fg}/quit{/cyan-fg} - Saves the config and closes the program. Will print an error if it fails to save the config file.
help.quit!: {cyan-fg}/quit!{/cyan-fg} - Closes the program without attempting to save the config file.
help.remove: {cyan-fg}/remove [username | ID]{/cyan-fg} - Remove a friend from your Steam friends list. {yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg}
help.save: {cyan-fg}/save{/cyan-fg} - Save login credentials and config options to 'config.json'.
help.scrollf: {cyan-fg}/scrollf{/cyan-fg} - Scroll chat window forward a screen.
help.scrollb: {cyan-fg}/scrollb{/cyan-fg} - Scroll chat window back a screen.
help.set: {cyan-fg}/set OPTION VALUE{/cyan-fg} - Change the value of any config option.
help.unblock: {cyan-fg}/unblock ID{/cyan-fg} - Remove a user from your ignore list.
help.w: {cyan-fg}/w NUM{/cyan-fg} - Change to window specified with number.

msg.notConnected: You are currently not connected to the Steam servers.
msg.help: %s: Use {cyan-fg}/cmds{/cyan-fg} to list all available commands. For usage information, use the {cyan-fg}/help CMD{/cyan-fg} command. If you wish to print the help page for all available commands, use the {cyan-fg}/help all{/cyan-fg} command.
msg.helpNotExist: %s: help entry does not exist for the following command: %s
msg.friendRequest: You have received a friend request from {blue-fg}%s{/blue-fg}. Type {cyan-fg}/accept{/cyan-fg} to cycle through your friend requests and choose which to accept.
msg.pendingFriendRequests: You have pending friend requests. Type {cyan-fg}/accept{/cyan-fg} to cycle through your friend requests and choose which to accept.
msg.noPendingFriendRequests: %s: You don't have any pending friend requests.
msg.bannedFromChat: You have been banned from the chatroom.
msg.chatInvite: You have received an invite to {blue-fg}%s{/blue-fg}, by {blue-fg}%s{/blue-fg}. Type {cyan-fg}/join{/cyan-fg} to accept the invite.
msg.reconnect: Disconnected from Steam servers. Will attempt to reconnect after %d seconds.
msg.reconnectLong: Attempts to reconnect have failed. Will retry after %d minutes.

cmd.wrongArgumentLength: %s: Incorrect amount of arguments. Should be %s.
cmd.argumentsNotInRange: %s: Incorrect amount of arguments. Should be between %s and %s.
cmd.invalidDebugLevel: %s: Please enter a debug level between 0 and 3.
cmd.invalidLogFileLevel: %s: %s: Please enter a logging level between 0 and 5.
cmd.invalidBoolean: %s: %s: Please specify either true or false.
cmd.switchChat: %s: Chat window has been switched to %s.
cmd.logFileEnable: Logging to file has been enabled at level %s.
cmd.logFileDisable: Logging to file has been disabled.
cmd.unableToLeaveChat: %s: Unable to leave chat as you are currently not connected to Steam.
cmd.notChatOrInvite: %s: You haven't been invited to any chatrooms or specified an invalid Chat ID.
cmd.removedFriend: %s: %s has been removed from your Steam friends list.
cmd.userNotFriend: %s: %s is not part of your Steam friends list.
cmd.saveSuccess: %s: Config file has been saved successfully.

err.findFriend: Invalid argument: Argument is not a friends or chat members steam ID or username.
err.steamGuard: Steam Guard is active. Please enter a Steam Guard code with the {cyan-fg}/set guardcode{/cyan-fg} command. If you're using the Steam Mobile Authenticator, please enter your code with the {cyan-fg}/set twofactor{/cyan-fg} command instead. Run {cyan-fg}/connect{/cyan-fg} again, once your code has been set.
err.guardCode: Your Steam Guard code must consist of 5 alphanumeric characters. Please enter it correctly with the {cyan-fg}/set guardcode{/cyan-fg} command.
err.loginInfo: Invalid username or password. Please set your login information correctly and run {cyan-fg}/connect{/cyan-fg}.
err.invalidCode: Specified Steam Guard code is invalid. Clearing guard code. Please reattempt connection with {cyan-fg}/connect{/cyan-fg}.
err.loginTimeout: There have been too many login failures from your network in a short time period. Please wait and try again later.
err.needTwoFactor: Your Steam account has Two-Factor Authentication enabled. Please set your Two-Factor code with the {cyan-fg}/set twofactor VALUE{/cyan-fg} command and reconnect.
err.quitSaveError: %s: Error when saving config file. Use {cyan-fg}/quit!{/cyan-fg} command if you wish to quit without saving.
